Articles.Content:
A prototype small space station. (Requires mods)

Download link is below. Here are the used mods:

MechanicalJeb by r4m0n/Anatid Robotics.

NovaPunch Remix pack (for first stage engine).

Mechanical Mouse Industries Satellite pack.

Enjoy Responsibly! Comment it you like!

-halocon720

PS: May be a bit glitchy in the fact that sometimes the End Mission option doesn't do anything and the mission can't be ended. Probably because of MechJeb's new version. Oh well.

UPDATE: Here is a space dock version that uses the Orbital & Planetary Construction mod.

Edited August 30, 2012 by halocon720
Convenience for others.

Also, here are my recommended orbital parameters:

Kerbin: 200x200, turn start 20k, turn end 150k

Mun: 40x40 orbit
